Ony Paule Ratsimbazafy (amụrụ na 3 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1976) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ na Madagascar lara ezumike nká nke bụ ọkachamara na mita 400.

N'afọ 1998, o ritere ọla nchara na African Championships, ya mere a họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Africa na 4 × 400 mita relay na afo 1998 IAAF World Cup. Ndị otu ahụ, na Ratsimbazafy, Amy Mbacke Thiam, Tacko Diouf na Falilat Ogunkoya, mechara nke asaa.

Ratsimbazafy wee sọọ mpi na 4 × 100 mita relay na afọ 1999 World Championships na afọ 2000 Olympic Games, oge abụọ ahụ na-enweghị ọganihu site na okpomọkụ, ọ bụ ezie na e debere ndekọ mba nke 43.61 sekọnd na Olimpik.
Oge kachasị mma ya n'elu 400 m bụ 52.05 sekọnd, nke o nwetara na Julaị, na afọ 1998 na Paris
Nke a bụkwa ihe ndeke Malagasy ugbu a.
